pageContext.claim: “They'll make Washington, D.C., and other liberal places the 51st, 52nd, 53rd states of the union, guaranteeing the radical left a permanent majority in the U.S. Senate and the House and the electoral college.”
pageContext.analysis: There is certainly support for District of Columbia statehood among Democrats and also Puerto Rico. That would be four new senators. But we have no idea why Trump suggests there could be six additional senators. (Guam? The Northern Mariana Islands?)
